CustomField.description: When set, these values will override the values on the record being cloned. List should be separated by commas. Note: this functionality should be used in the case of objects using Sequence Numbers, to set Name to "System Number". Syntax example: Field_API_Name__c = "Default Value"; Field_API_Name2__c = "Default Value".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional. Field Name value pairs that override the copied values of the cloned record. Syntax example: Text_Field_Name__c = "Default Value", Blank_Value__c = "", Checkbox_Field_Name__c = false, Number_Field_Name__c = 123
CustomField.label: Default Values
